Description: When a young couple agrees to house-sit a mysterious old mansion, 
	     they discover that the resident spirits are more than just willing
	     - they&#039;re downright horny! A sexy, supernatural tale of haunting 
	     eroticism from award-winning director John Leslie.
	     
I come across this video in my "big box of porn" the other day,
and decided to preserve it since it was kinda hard to come by now days.
The initial enhancement was done through my "Sima Color Correction Pro Series"
enhancer. Once copied to my DVR, I removed HDD and put into computer to do some
initial editing. I cut about 3-5 seconds out where the tape was bad, but no major
scene. After that I re-encoded through TMPGEnc applying several filters including
cropping a bit off the bottom to get rid of most of the usual VHS lines. Once
this was done, I ran it through AGK(Auto Gordian Knot) with a couple of more
filters, including sharper matrix, and a bit more cropping off the bottom.
The ending results, I think are pretty good for a VHS tape that has been bounced
around half way across the planet. Let me know what you think. ENJOY!!
